Html:
I'm pretty UI-challenged when it comes to graphics but I need my applications to look like I have a clue. Thanks for the work guys.
My only suggestion (and I'm sure its coming) is more skins. :)

Thanks for your interest in our project.

As for the lack of skins, you are right that we should expect more request like this. However our current goal is not to create a huge library of skins, but instead provide the code necessary to apply such custom skins to your forms.

On the other hand if you know any graphics designer or other source for nice skins let us know and will be happy to include it in our project.
